title: Fragrant Thai Chicken & Noodle Broth
summary: The recipe Fragrant Thai Chicken & Noodle Broth could satisfy your Asian craving in around 19 minutes. Watching your figure? This dairy free recipe has 893 calories, 61g of protein, and 10g of fat per serving. This recipe serves 2 and costs $9.53 per serving. 10 people found this recipe to be scrumptious and satisfying. A mixture of shallots, handful mange tout, pak choi, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so scrumptious. A couple people really liked this main course. With a spoonacular score of 98%, this dish is outstanding. Try Lemony, Fragrant Chicken Broth, Noodle broth with Thai flavours, and Fragrant Chicken and Rice Noodle Soup for similar recipes.

winePairing.pairingText: Asian on the menu? Try pairing with Gewurztraminer, Chenin Blanc, and Riesling. The best wine for Asian food depends on the cuisine and dish - of course - but these acidic whites pair with a number of traditional meals, spicy or not. The Cave de Ribeauville Collection Gewurztraminer with a 4.5 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 19 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Cave de Ribeauville Collection Gewurztraminer
productMatches.description: This lemon yellow wine has an intensely aromatic bouquet, with notes of spice and lychee. On the palate, the mature acidity keeps the wine fresh, yet finessed. Pair with spicy food, soft cheeses, and pastries.Gewurztraminer is the most aromatic of Alsace wines. With its aromas of rose, lychee and spices, it embellishes our palate. Soft, it goes well with foie gras, a fruit-based dessert. Semi-dry, it accompanies spicy dishes or strong cheeses.
